sentences.en: a struggle to defend our homeland
All our officers are trained to defend themselves against knife attacks.
sentences.cn: 我们所有的警察都接受过自卫训练，能够对付持刀袭击。

sentences.en: He hired a top QC to defend him.
sentences.cn: 他雇了一名顶级的王室法律顾问为他辩护。

sentences.en: He used a sword to try to defend his shop from a rampaging mob.
sentences.cn: 他拿了一把剑试图保护自己的店不受闹事暴徒的打砸。

sentences.en: I have sworn an oath to defend her.
Men were detached to defend the pass.
sentences.cn: 已经派遣了人员去防守关隘.

sentences.en: She was always defending her husband in front of their daughter.
sentences.cn: 她在女儿面前总是为丈夫辩解。

sentences.en: Students should be ready to explain and defend their views.
sentences.cn: 学生应该勇于为自己的观点进行解释和辩护。

sentences.en: The accused has the right to defend himself.
The cat fought fiercely to defend its young.
sentences.cn: 那只猫拼命反抗,以保护小猫.

sentences.en: The dyke was built to defend the road from being washed away by the sea.
sentences.cn: 建筑这座堤坝是为了保护公路不被海水冲垮.

sentences.en: They tried to defend themselves against the enemy with all their might.
sentences.cn: 他们竭尽全力抵御敌人.

sentences.en: This is my native land and I'll defend it with my life!
sentences.cn: 这是我的祖国,我将用生命保卫她.

sentences.en: This is the weapon that he used to defend himself withal.
sentences.cn: 这就是他用来自卫的武器.

sentences.en: Those people who took up weapons to defend themselves are political prisoners.
sentences.cn: 那些拿起武器自卫的人是些政治犯。

sentences.en: To argue otherwise is trying to defend the indefensible.
sentences.cn: 持相反的论点就是试图为站不住脚的事情强辩。

sentences.en: We are determined to defend our motherland at all costs.
sentences.cn: 我们决心不惜任何代价保卫祖国.

sentences.en: We must defend our motherland from the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我们必须保卫祖国防御进犯之敌.

trans.tran_cn: 防御，保卫，防守，替…辩护，辩解，卫冕，参加…以保住…
trans.tran_en: to use arguments to protect something or someone from criticism, or to prove that something is right

trans.tran_cn: 防守， 保护； 为…辩护
trans.tran_en: to do something in order to protect someone or something from being attacked
